name: tiffin-wale
description: TiffinMate - A comprehensive food delivery platform

scripts.install:all: bun install && bun install:backend && bun install:frontend && bun install:mobile && bun install:partner && bun install:admin
scripts.mobile:android: cd interface/student-app && bun exec expo run:android
scripts.mobile:ios: cd interface/student-app && bun exec expo run:ios
scripts.mobile:build:web: cd interface/student-app && bun exec expo export --platform web
scripts.mobile:lint: cd interface/student-app && bun exec expo lint
scripts.partner:build:web: cd interface/partner-app && bun exec expo export --platform web
scripts.partner:lint: cd interface/partner-app && bun exec expo lint
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run backend:dev" "bun run frontend:dev" "bun run mobile:dev" "bun run partner:dev" "bun run admin:dev"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "bun run backend:dev" "bun run frontend:dev" "bun run admin:dev"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently "bun run backend:dev" "bun run mobile:dev" "bun run partner:dev"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "bun run backend:build" "bun run frontend:build" "bun run admin:build"
scripts.deploy:backend: cd monolith_backend && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd interface/official-web-app && bun run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:mobile: cd interface/student-app && bun run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:partner: cd interface/partner-app && bun run build:gcloud && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:admin: cd interface/super-admin-web && bun run build && gcloud app deploy app.yaml
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy:backend && bun run deploy:frontend && bun run deploy:mobile && bun run deploy:partner && bun run deploy:admin && gcloud app deploy dispatch.yaml
scripts.clean: bun run clean:modules && bun run clean:build
scripts.clean:build: find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.test:all: concurrently "bun run backend:test" "cd interface/student-app && bun test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "bun run backend:lint" "bun run mobile:lint" "bun run partner:lint" "bun run admin:lint"
